author: Angel Smith
text:
I am searching for salary information for certain exempt positions from municipalities with a population between 10,000 -20,000. I am in the process of conducting a compensation study for the City of Sartell, MN and any information you can share would be greatly appreciated. 
The positions being surveyed include: 
City Administrator 
Finance Director
Police Chief
Deputy Police Chief
Public Works Director
Assistant Public Works Director
Planning & Community Development Director
Chief Building Official
Deputy Clerk

PLEASE NOTE - Upon completion of the survey tabulation, I will provide a copy back to all that respond to this data request!

I can be contacted via email at Angel_R_Smith@yahoo.com or phone at 407-617-7271. 
Thank you for your assistance, 
Angel Smith
title: Compensation Study (municipalities w/pop. 10,000 -20,000)
